S03n248:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyavanapradeśe nirmānuṣasaṃpātanīrave vividhamṛgakulādhivāse tṛṇagahananimagnamūlavṛkṣakṣupabahule pathikayānavāhanacaraṇairavinyastamārgasimāntalekhe salilamārgavalmīkaśvabhraviṣamabhūbhāge balajavavarṇasattvasaṃpannaḥ saṃhananavatkāyopapannaḥ śarabho mṛgo babhūva |
S03n248:4: sa kāruṇyābhyāsādanabhidrugdhacittaḥ sattveṣu tṛṇaparṇasalilamātravṛttiḥ saṃtoṣaguṇādaraṇyavāsaniratamatiḥ pravivekakāma iva yogī tamaraṇyapradeśamabhyalaṃcakāra |
S03n248:6: cacāra tasmin sa vane vivikte yogīva saṃtuṣṭamatistṛṇāgraiḥ ||1 ||
S03n248:7: atha kadācidanyatamo rājā tasya viṣayasyādhipatisturagavarādhirūḍhaḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrapāṇirmṛgeṣvastrakauśalamātmano jijñāsamānaḥ saṃrāgavaśājjavena mṛgānanupatannuttamajavena vājinā dūrādapasṛtahastyaśvarathapadātikāyastaṃ pradeśamupajagāma |
S03n248:8: dūradeva cālokya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ hantumutpatitaniścayaḥ samutkṛṣṭaniśitasāyako yataḥ sa mahātmā tena turagavaraṃ saṃcodayāmāsa |
S03n248:9: atha bodhisattvaḥ samālokyaiva turagavaragataṃ sāyudhamabhipatantaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ śaktimānapi pratyavasthātuṃ nivṛttasāhasasaṃrambhatvātpareṇa javātiśayena samutpapāta |
S03n248:10: so'nugamyamānastena turaṃgameṇānumārgāgataṃ mahacchvabhraṃ goṣpadamiva javena laṅghayitvā pradudrāva |
S03n248:11: atha turagavarastenaiva mārgeṇa taṃ śarabhamanupatannuttamena javapramāṇena tacchvabhramāsādya laṅgayitumanadhyavasitamatiḥ sahasā vyatiṣṭhata |
S03n248:14: nibaddhacakṣuḥ śarabhe sa tasmin saṃlakṣayāmāsa na taṃ prapātam |
S03n248:16: atha bodhisattvasturagakhuraśabdapraśamātkiṃ nu khalu pratinivṛttaḥ syādayaṃ rājeti samutpannavitarkaḥ paścādāvarjitāvadanaḥ samālokayan dadarśa tamaśvamanārohakaṃ tasmin prapātoddeśe'vasthitam |
S03n248:17: tasya buddhirabhavat-niyatamatra prapāte nipatitaḥ sa rājā |
S03n248:18: na hyatra kiṃcidviśramahetoḥ saṃśrayaṇīyarūpaṃ ghanapracchāyaṃ vṛkṣamūlamasti nīlotpaladalanīlavimalasalilamavagāhayogyaṃ vā saraḥ |
S03n248:19: na caiva vyālamṛgānuvicaritamaraṇyavanamavagāḍhena yatra kvacidupasṛjya turagavaraṃ viśramyate mṛgayā vānuṣṭhiyate |
S03n248:20: na cātra kiṃcittṛṇagahanamapi tadvidhaṃ yatra nilīnaḥ syāt |
S03n248:21: tadvyaktamātra śvabhre nipatitena tena rājñā bhavitavyamiti |
S03n248:22: tataḥ sa mahātmā niścayamupetya vadhake'pi tasmin parāṃ karuṇāmupajagāma |
S03n248:28: murchānvitaḥ śokaparāyaṇo vā kaṣṭaṃ bata kleśamayaṃ prapannaḥ ||6 ||
S03n248:29: kiṇāṅkitānīva manāṃsi duḥkhairna hīnavargasya tathā vyathante |
S03n248:32: yadyapi sāvaśeṣaprāṇastannāyamupekṣituṃ yuktamiti vitarkayan sa mahātmā karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇahṛdayastaṃ prapātataṭāntamupajagāma |
S03n248:33: dadarśa cainaṃ tatra reṇusaṃsargānmṛditavārabāṇaśobhaṃ vyākulitoṣṇīṣavasanasaṃnāhaṃ prapātapatananighātasaṃjānītābhirvedanābhirāpīḍyamānahṛdayamāpatitavaitānyaṃ viceṣṭamānam |
S03n248:34: dṛṣṭvāya taṃ tatra viceṣṭamānaṃ narādhipaṃ bāṣpaparītanetraḥ |
S03n248:39: kaccinna te vikṣatamatra gātraṃ kaccidrujaste tanutāṃ gacchanti ||10 ||
S03n248:42: prapātapātādadhṛtiṃ ca mā gāḥ śakto'hamuddhartumito bhavantam |
S03n248:44: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhatenābhivyāhāreṇa vismayāvarjitahṛdayaḥ saṃjāyamānavrīḍo niyatamiti cintāmāpede-
S03n248:45: dṛṣṭāvadāne dviṣati kā nāmāsya dayā mayi |
S03n248:51: prapātaniṣpeṣakṛtāḥ sahyā eva ca me rujaḥ ||15 ||
S03n248:55: avijñāya svabhāvaṃ te tacca mā hṛdaye kṛthāḥ ||17 ||
S03n248:56: atha śarabhastasya rājñaḥ prītisūcakena tenābhivyāhāreṇānumatamuddharaṇamavetya puruṣabhāragurvyā śīlayā taduddharaṇayogyāṃ kṛtvā viditātmabalapramāṇastaṃ nṛpatimuddhartuṃ vyavasitamatiravatīrya taṃ prapātaṃ savinayamabhigamyovāca-
S03n248:59: tadārohatu matpuṣṭhaṃ mahārājaḥ sulagnaśca mayi bhavatviti |
S03n248:63: uddhṛtya durgādatha taṃ narendraṃ prītaḥ samānīya turaṃgameṇa |
S03n248:64: nivedya cāsmai svapurāya mārgaṃ vanaprayāṇābhimukho babhūva ||20 ||
S03n248:65: atha sa rājā kṛtajñatvāttena tasya vinayamadhureṇopacāreṇa samāvartitahṛdayaḥ saṃpariṣvajya śarabhamuvāca-
S03n248:66: prāṇā amī me śarabha tvadīyāḥ prāgeva yatrāsti mama prabhutvam |
S03n248:67: tadarhasi draṣṭumidaṃ puraṃ me satyāṃ rucau tatra ca te'stu vāsaḥ ||21 ||
S03n248:69: hitvā bhavantaṃ mama nanvayuktamekasya gehābhimukhasya gantum ||22 ||
S03n248:73: abhyāsayogena hi sajjanasya svabhāvatāmeva guṇā vrajanti ||23 ||
S03n248:76: cikīrṣite te yadi matpriyaṃ tu vyādhavrataṃ vīra vimuñca tasmāt |
S03n248:79: ityātmanaḥ syādanabhīpsitaṃ yanna tatpareṣvācarituṃ kṣamaṃ te ||26 ||
S03n248:80: kīrtikṣayaṃ sādhujanādvigarhāṃ duḥkhaṃ ca pāpaprabhavaṃ viditvā |
S03n248:81: pāpaṃ dviṣatpakṣamivoddharasva nopekṣituṃ vyādhiriva kṣamaṃ te ||27 ||
S03n248:83: tānyeva puṇyāni vivardhayethā na karśanīyo hyupakāripakṣaḥ ||28 ||
S03n248:88: iti sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sāṃparāyikeṣvartheṣvanugṛhya saṃpratigṛhītavacanastena rājñā sabahumānamabhivīkṣyamāṇastameva vanāntaṃ praviveśa |
S03n248:89: tadevaṃ jighāṃsumapyāpadgatamanukampanta eva mahākārūṇikā nopekṣanta iti karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyam |
S03n248:92: evaṃ tiryaggatānāmapi mahātmanāṃ vadhakeṣvapi sānukrodhā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā |
S03n248:93: ko manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā sattveṣvanukrośavikalaṃ śobheteti prāṇiṣu sānukrośenāryeṇa bhavitavyam |
